mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(ORDER_NO, USER_NO, PAY_NO, ORDER_NAME, TOTAL_PRICE, ORDER_COMMENT, ORDER_ENROLL, ORDER_RECEIVER, ORDER_ADDRESS, ORDER_TEL, ORDER_FEE) VALUES (#{pay_no}, #{user_no}, #{pay_no}, #{order_name}, #{total_price}, #{order_comment}, #{order_enroll}, #{order_receiver}, #{order_address}, #{order_tel}, #{order_fee})
